name: Silence of the Chickens
description:
!!!Silence of the chickens!!!

Turn based 3rd person survival shooting game
Gameplay video:

How to play?
-A key:Rotate Left
-D key: Rotate Right
-W/S keys: Move Forward/Backward
-Hold Right Mouse Button: 3rd Person Mode
-Left Mouse Button: Shoot
Game Rules:
Your score begins to increase when it is your turn. Keep an eye on the score.
Your time is limited to move and shoot. When you shoot, your turn ends.
You play as a chicken. Your weapon is your ass, your ammo is your egg. Keep that in mind. 
Created by Tayfun GURLEVIK, tgurlevik@gmail.com
